com.github.mk23.jmxproxy.core

Class Host

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mk23.jmxproxy.core.Host
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializable

    public class Host
extends Object
implements com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializable

    JMX Host tracker and serializer.

    Maintains a map of JMX MBean names and their values. Implements JsonSerializable interface to convert the stored map into JSON.
    Since:
    2018-02-08
    Version:
    3.4.0
    Author:
    mk23
    See Also:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializable

    • Constructor Detail

      • Host

        public Host()

        Default constructor.

        Creates a map of MBean name to associated values.

    • Method Detail

      • addMBean

        public final MBean addMBean(String mbeanName)

        Inserts a new MBean name to value association.

        Creates a new MBean object and inserts into the map store associating it to the specified mbean name. Uses default attribute History size configuration.
        Parameters:
        mbeanName - name of the MBean used as the map key.
        Returns:
        the newly created MBean object.

      • addMBean

        public final MBean addMBean(String mbeanName,
                            int historySize)

        Inserts a new MBean name to value association.

        Creates a new MBean object and inserts into the map store associating it to the specified mbean name. Uses custom attribute History size configuration.
        Parameters:
        mbeanName - name of the MBean used as the map key.
        historySize - number of items to preserve in the associated History.
        Returns:
        the newly created MBean object.

      • removeMBean

        public final void removeMBean(String mbeanName)

        Deletes an mbean association.

        Removes an associated MBean from the map store for this host.
        Parameters:
        mbeanName - name of the MBean to remove.

      • setLimit

        public final Host setLimit(Integer bound)

        Sets the thread local history request limit.

        Set the thread local limit for all History when serializing to JSON. Because this method returns its object, requesting serialization can be done * with a single statement.

        For example:

        return Response.ok(host.setLimit(5)).build();
        Parameters:
        bound - the number of items to retreive from History for this thread.
        Returns:
        this host object for chaining calls.
        See Also:
        javax.ws.rs.core.Response

      • getMBeans

        public final Set<String> getMBeans()

        Getter for mbean names.

        Extracts and returns the unique Set of all currently stored MBean names.
        Returns:
        Set of MBean name Strings.

      • getMBean

        public final MBean getMBean(String mbean)

        Getter for specific mbean.

        Fetches the specified MBean from the map store.
        Parameters:
        mbean - name of the MBean to look up in the map store.
        Returns:
        MBean object if found, null otherwise.
